summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of AntiGravity Rental React app. All core UI components render correctly, navigation works, forms are interactive, and error handling is graceful.

integration_issues.issue: Direct URL access to routes like /products, /cart returns 404 when using simple HTTP server - requires SPA-compatible server configuration

issues: Missing data-testid attributes for automated testing

passed_tests: Home page loads without blank screen or JavaScript errors
Main router renders Home page with hero content and CTA button
Navigation links work: Home, Catalog, Login, Sign Up
Login page renders with interactive form fields
Register page renders with proper form structure
ProductDetails page handles non-existent products gracefully with 'Product Not Found' message
Cart page structure loads and can handle localStorage data
Form fields are interactive and accept user input
Error handling is graceful - no JavaScript runtime crashes
Footer and branding elements display correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Configure proper SPA routing in production server (currently using simple HTTP server which doesn't handle client-side routes). 2. Add data-testid attributes to interactive elements for better automated testing. 3. Consider fixing supervisor configuration to point to /app/client instead of /app/frontend.
